title: Ticket #4174: condor_who always tries to talk to startd
description: With condor_who being used for state transitions, there will not always be a startd in a personal condor being examined with -daemon flag
remarks:
2014-Jan-27 16:30:00 by johnkn:
actual problem is that condor_who -daemons always trys to verify child pids with the master. when the master isn't running this takes a while to timeout.

condor_who -daemons -quick can be used to avoid this delay, but the PIDs that are returned in this case have not been verified - they may be stale values.
creator: bt
